holidays.title: ​National Caramel Apple Day
holidays.description: Caramel apples and Halloween go together like ghosts, goblins, tricks, and treats.

holidays.title: National Unity Day (Rashtriya Ekta Diwas)
holidays.description: On this day, locals are encouraged to remember the inherent strength and resilience of the nation.

holidays.title: Books For Treats Day
holidays.description: On Halloween, there’s candy for the mind, and it is called books.

holidays.title: Deepavali
holidays.description: Let the light bless our homes and hearts on the auspicious day of Deepavali.

holidays.title: Diwali
holidays.description: Lasting over five days, the holiday is celebrated by millions of Hindus, Jains and Sikhs worldwide.

holidays.title: Girl Scout Founder’s Day
holidays.description: This day commemorates the heroics of Juliette Gordon Low, who founded the Girl Scouts.

holidays.title: Kali Puja
holidays.description: Settle in for a transformative journey into the world of the goddess Kali.

holidays.title: Naraka Chaturdashi
holidays.description: Indians celebrate the second day of the five-day-long Diwali festival.

holidays.title: National Doorbell Day
holidays.description: This Halloween, spare a thought for your doorbell as it chimes throughout the day.

holidays.title: National Knock Knock Joke Day
holidays.description: Get ready to open the door to fun punchlines on National Knock Knock Joke Day.

holidays.title: National Magic Day
holidays.description: Move over Halloween, National Magic Day takes the spotlight this October 31.

holidays.title: Reformation Day
holidays.description: The Reformation provided by Martin Luther has an immense and lasting influence worth celebrating.

holidays.title: Samhain
holidays.description: Light a sacred bonfire and call out to the gods on this night!

holidays.title: World Cities Day
holidays.description: Let’s look at cities through the lens of World Cities Day this October 31.

holidays.title: World Savings Day
holidays.description: Remember, rather save today than spend all your money and be strapped for cash tomorrow.

holidays.title: Alison Victoria’s Birthday
holidays.description: The queen of home restoration's fondness for homes and buildings lasted her entire life.

holidays.title: Ansu Fati’s Birthday
holidays.description: We can only wonder what’s to come for this remarkable soccer star.

holidays.title: Christopher Columbus’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this explorer who paved the way for intercontinental travels and the world map.

holidays.title: Dan Rather’s Birthday
holidays.description: No matter the age, this unstoppable, career-driven man just keeps it going!

holidays.title: Frank Iero’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's a talented guitarist and vocalist for the world-famous band, My Chemical Romance!

holidays.title: Icewear Vezzo’s Birthday
holidays.description: We're looking forward to seeing what else this great musician has to offer the entertainment industry.

holidays.title: ItsFunneh’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube sensation has managed to capture the hearts of millions around the globe.

holidays.title: John Candy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This legend has been an inspiration to this day and his impact is still being felt.

holidays.title: John Keats’s Birthday
holidays.description: Gone too soon? Here’s everything you need to know about John Keats.

holidays.title: Juliette Gordon Low’s Birthday
holidays.description: We'll always remember her as the ultimate American girl for all girls.

holidays.title: Khalyla Kuhn’s Birthday
holidays.description: As her podcast continues to gain popularity, Khalya Kuhn's fame is also rising.

holidays.title: Michael Landon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Landon managed to cement his title as the King of Heartwarming Television.

holidays.title: Nick Saban’s Birthday
holidays.description: This legendary football coach has led many college teams to victory in the N.F.L.

holidays.title: Vanilla Ice’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s so much more to this iconic rapper and we are dishing out all the details.

holidays.title: Willow Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: She may be the daugther of Will Smith, but she's creating a successful name for herself.
